name: CASTILLO: Cursed Journey
description:
Castillo - Cursed Journey is a 2D action platformer and prequel story to Castillo - Shattered Mirrors.

Play as an adventurer who stumbles across Dracula's castle after seeking help for their village. Witness the origin story of the Undestined Traveller as they uncover Dracula's plan.

Explore three different dimensions on the brink of apocalypse and try to survive hordes of Dracula's minions guarding mysterious and powerful crystal shards. 

Experience the world of Castillo in stunning 8-bit depth with four stunning shades of green/grey to astonish any player.

Castillo - Cursed Journey was designed to run on a Game Boy and was programmed using GB studio.
